messages.content: What does the select_folder_path_easy extension do?
The select_folder_path_easy extension connects nodes and specifies the output path of the generated images to a manageable path.

To install select_folder_path_easy, you need to navigate to the ComfyUI directory, then custom_nodes, and clone the repository from GitHub with the command 'git clone https://github.com/Umikaze-job/select_folder_path_easy'.
How is the select_folder_path_easy extension used?
To use the select_folder_path_easy extension, right-click on the Save Image node and click on Convert filename_prefix to input, then connect the select folder path easy and Save Image nodes.
How is the file name specified in select_folder_path_easy?
In select_folder_path_easy, the file name is specified with the 'file_name' parameter. The file will be named '[file_name]_[image_id].png'.
What is the 'time_format' parameter used for in select_folder_path_easy?
The 'time_format' parameter in select_folder_path_easy is used to specify the format of the time folder.
